titleInfo.title: Efficient phototrophic production of a high-value sesquiterpenoid from the eukaryotic microalga Chlamydomonas reinhardtii

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Lauersen, Kyle J., Baier, Thomas, Wichmann, Julian, Wördenweber, Robin, Mussgnug, Jan H., Hübner, Wolfgang, Huser, Thomas, and Kruse, Olaf. 2016. “Efficient phototrophic production of a high-value sesquiterpenoid from the eukaryotic microalga Chlamydomonas reinhardtii”.
